com.google.calendar.interoperability.connectorplugin.base
Interface PasswordLoader.EncryptionStrategy

All Superinterfaces:
SelfTestable
Enclosing class:
PasswordLoader
public static interface PasswordLoader.EncryptionStrategy
extends SelfTestable

Strategy to be used for encryption/decryption of passwords.

Field Summary
static PasswordLoader.EncryptionStrategy FAILOVER
          This encryption strategy will choose the strongest algorith available
static PasswordLoader.EncryptionStrategy MSCAPI
          Uses the Microsoft Crypto API
static PasswordLoader.EncryptionStrategy NONE
          This encryption-strategy does not encode the password at all.
static PasswordLoader.EncryptionStrategy OBFUSCATE
          This encryption strategy uses a simple XOR encryption to make the password non-readable to someone accidentally opening up the file.
 
Method Summary
 String decryptPassword(String encryptedPassword, Properties p)
          Decrypts a password using the given strategy
 String encryptPassword(String unencryptedPassword, Properties p)
          Encrypts a password using the given strategy
 
Methods inherited from interface com.google.calendar.interoperability.connectorplugin.base.SelfTestable
selfTest
 

Field Detail

NONE

static final PasswordLoader.EncryptionStrategy NONE
This encryption-strategy does not encode the password at all. This is unsecure but can be used for debugging purposes.

OBFUSCATE

static final PasswordLoader.EncryptionStrategy OBFUSCATE
This encryption strategy uses a simple XOR encryption to make the password non-readable to someone accidentally opening up the file. This does not provide any security whatsoever, and should not be used to secure any data.

MSCAPI

static final PasswordLoader.EncryptionStrategy MSCAPI
Uses the Microsoft Crypto API

FAILOVER

static final PasswordLoader.EncryptionStrategy FAILOVER
This encryption strategy will choose the strongest algorith available

Method Detail

encryptPassword

String encryptPassword(String unencryptedPassword,
                       Properties p)
Encrypts a password using the given strategy

Parameters:
unencryptedPassword - the password to be encrypted
p - a set of properties with potential additional settings
Returns:
the encrypted password

decryptPassword

String decryptPassword(String encryptedPassword,
                       Properties p)
Decrypts a password using the given strategy

Parameters:
encryptedPassword - the password to be decrypted
p - a set of properties with potential additional settings
Returns:
the decrypted password
